name: A New Tale
description:
Why settle for boring old gods and goddesses when you could do it yourself? I mean, you know exactly how this works!

From the creator of [INSERT POPULAR FRANCHISE] comes a game mythology-them-up about writing your own amazing or terrible stories! Use the mouse to select options and show those old simpletons how it's done! Featuring...

  • Over 20 endings!
  • 21 endings, actually.
  • A single piece of music!
  • Words!
  • No controller support!

So what are you waiting for? Dive in and get started...

Note: The game is done, but the art is not. This is an early submission for the Desert Bus for Hope 2019 Game Jam, and it will probably be updated before the deadline. Feel free to play it now, but know that I'm still working on it.
